name: @opuscapita/event-client
description: An event client to handle the event system in microservices architecture.

scripts.debug: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:9230 --watch src/ --watch local/ local/debug.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc mocha --timeout 120000 -R mocha-junit-reporter test/*.js
scripts.test:raw: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx mocha --inspect=0.0.0.0:9230  --timeout 120000 test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run clean; npm run setup-consul; npx mocha --watch --inspect=0.0.0.0:9230 --timeout 120000 --recursive  ./test/**/*.test.js ./src/**/*.js
scripts.test-coverage: npm run clean ; npm run setup-consul ; npx nyc --reporter=lcov mocha --timeout 120000 && sed -i 's/\/home\/node\/event-client\//\.\//g' coverage/lcov.info
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch -m 'Version set to %s. [skip ci]'

author: Dennis Buecker <dennis.buecker@opuscapita.com>
